title: Cranberry-Apple Relish Recipe
full_text:
Cranberry-Apple Relish Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
12
to 16 servings
Makes
2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
(
12-ounce) bag
fresh cranberries
1
sweet red
apple
, such as Gala or
Fuji
, cored and roughly chopped
1/2
cup
white sugar
1/4
cup
orange juice
1
teaspoon
orange zest
1/2
teaspoon
kosher salt
, plus more to taste
Directions
Place cranberries, apple, sugar, orange juice, orange zest, and salt in workbowl of a food processor fitted with steel blade. Pulse until cranberries and apple are finely chopped, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as necessary. Transfer to serving dish and serve immediately, or store in an airtight container in refrigerator for up to a week.
Special Equipment
Food processor
Condiments & Sauces
No-Cook
Cranberry
Thanksgiving Side Dishes
